Question: Washington Laboratories Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Washington Laboratories Ltd

CES 2024

- Fully Accredited EMI/EMC Testing Laboratory with over 35 years of experience in EMC, Radio, and telecommunications testing
- Specializes in Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) Testing, Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) Testing, Radio Frequency (RF) Testing, Product Safety Testing, and Environmental Testing
- Offers complete product safety approvals for the U.S., Canadian, European, and international markets
- Provides engineering services including emissions control, product safety, product performance, RF radiation prediction, and antenna-to-antenna coupling
- Offers cyber security services for Internet of Things (IoT) devices
- Provides integrated services for international approvals and compliance testing
- Offers field testing and site surveys for compliance testing and PCS site surveys
